translation.de: ich komme, du kommst, er/sie kommt, wir/sie kommen

instruction.en: Read the story of Sosîn and Delal
instruction.de: Lies die Geschichte von Sosîn und Delal

lines.ku: Navê wê Sosîn e. Navê hevala wê Delal e.
lines.en: Her name is Sosîn. Her friend's name is Delal.
lines.de: Ihr Name ist Sosîn. Ihre Freundin heißt Delal.

lines.ku: Sosîn sêvê davêje. Delal sêvê digire.
lines.en: Sosîn throws the apple. Delal catches the apple.
lines.de: Sosîn wirft den Apfel. Delal fängt den Apfel.

lines.speaker: Delal
lines.ku: Na, ez sêvê dixwim. Ez birçî me.
lines.en: No, I eat the apple. I am hungry.
lines.de: Nein, ich esse den Apfel. Ich bin hungrig.

explanation.en: "Sosîn sêvê davêje" = Sosîn throws the apple. davêje = throws (from avêtin).
explanation.de: "Sosîn sêvê davêje" = Sosîn wirft den Apfel. davêje = wirft (von avêtin).

explanation.en: "Delal dikene" = Delal laughs. dikene = laughs (from kenîn).
explanation.de: "Delal dikene" = Delal lacht. dikene = lacht (von kenîn).

explanation.en: Delal says "Ez birçî me" = I am hungry. That's why she eats the apple. birçî = hungry.
explanation.de: Delal sagt "Ez birçî me" = Ich bin hungrig. Deshalb isst sie den Apfel. birçî = hungrig.

instruction.en: Read the second dialogue about origins and occupations
instruction.de: Lies den zweiten Dialog über Herkunft und Berufe

title.en: Ji ku yî? — Where are you from?
title.de: Ji ku yî? — Woher kommst du?

lines.speaker: A
lines.ku: Roj baş, tu ji ku yî?
lines.en: Good day, where are you from?

lines.speaker: B
lines.ku: Roj baş, ez ji Amedê me. Û tu?
lines.en: Good day, I am from Amed (Diyarbakir). And you?
lines.de: Guten Tag, ich komme aus Amed (Diyarbakir). Und du?

lines.speaker: A
lines.ku: Ez ji Dêrsimê me. Tu kurd î?
lines.en: I am from Dersim. Are you Kurdish?
lines.de: Ich komme aus Dersim. Bist du Kurde/Kurdin?

lines.speaker: B
lines.ku: Erê, ez kurd im. Hûn li malê bi kurdî dipeyivin?
lines.en: Yes, I am Kurdish. Do you speak Kurdish at home?
lines.de: Ja, ich bin Kurde. Sprecht ihr zu Hause Kurdisch?

lines.speaker: A
lines.ku: Em zazakî dipeyivin. Ez kurdî nizanim.
lines.en: We speak Zazaki. I don't know Kurdish (Kurmanji).
lines.de: Wir sprechen Zazaki. Ich kann kein Kurdisch (Kurmandschi).

lines.speaker: C
lines.ku: Roj baş! Ez ji kar têm. Hûn ji ku tên?
lines.en: Good day! I come from work. Where do you (pl.) come from?
lines.de: Guten Tag! Ich komme von der Arbeit. Woher kommt ihr?

lines.speaker: A
lines.ku: Em ji zanîngehê tên. Tu çi karî dikî?
lines.en: We come from the university. What is your job?
lines.de: Wir kommen von der Universität. Was ist dein Beruf?

lines.speaker: C
lines.ku: Ez doktor im. Hûn çi karî dikin?
lines.en: I am a doctor. What are your jobs?
lines.de: Ich bin Arzt. Was sind eure Berufe?

instruction.en: Complete: Em li malê bi kurdî ___.
instruction.de: Vervollständige: Em li malê bi kurdî ___.

explanation.en: For "em" (we), the verb peyivîn → dipeyivin. We speak Kurdish at home.
explanation.de: Für "em" (wir) wird das Verb peyivîn → dipeyivin. Wir sprechen zu Hause Kurdisch.

instruction.en: Match each person with their occupation
instruction.de: Ordne jeder Person ihren Beruf zu

lessons.description: Read an annotated dialogue identifying which verb is used in each line, and learn new verbs: jenîn, hez kirin, firotin.

learningObjective.en: Read an annotated dialogue identifying which verb is used in each line, and learn new verbs: jenîn, hez kirin, firotin
learningObjective.de: Lies einen kommentierten Dialog, identifiziere das verwendete Verb in jeder Zeile und lerne neue Verben: jenîn, hez kirin, firotin

translation.de: ich spiele, du spielst, er/sie spielt, wir/sie spielen

content.example: Ez ji muzîka kurdî hez dikim.

translation.en: tembur — a traditional Kurdish long-necked lute

instruction.en: Read the dialogue — notice which verb is used in each line
instruction.de: Lies den Dialog — achte darauf, welches Verb in jeder Zeile verwendet wird

lines.speaker: A
lines.de: Guten Tag, wie geht es dir? [bûn]

lines.speaker: B
lines.ku: Roj baş, ez baş im, spas. Û tu?
lines.en: Good day, I am good, thanks. And you? [bûn]
lines.de: Guten Tag, mir geht es gut, danke. Und dir? [bûn]

lines.speaker: A
lines.ku: Ez jî baş im, spas. Tu çi dikî?
lines.en: I am also good, thanks. What do you do? [kirin]
lines.de: Mir geht es auch gut, danke. Was machst du? [kirin]

lines.speaker: A
lines.ku: Tu ji muzîka kurdî hez dikî?
lines.en: Do you like Kurdish music? [hez kirin]

lines.speaker: B
lines.ku: Ez ji muzîka kurdî hez dikim.

lines.speaker: B
lines.ku: Na, nan naxwim. Ez sêvê dixwim.
lines.en: No, I don't eat bread. I eat the apple. [xwarin]
lines.de: Nein, ich esse kein Brot. Ich esse den Apfel. [xwarin]

lines.speaker: B
lines.ku: Ev pirtûk e. Tu pirtûkê dixwînî?
lines.en: This is a book. Do you read the book? [xwendin]
lines.de: Das ist ein Buch. Liest du das Buch? [xwendin]

lines.speaker: A
lines.en: I don't know. I go home. [zanîn, çûn]
lines.de: Ich weiß nicht. Ich gehe nach Hause. [zanîn, çûn]

explanation.en: B says "Ez amûran difroşim" and specifies "gîtar û tembûrê difroşim" — I sell guitars and temburs.
explanation.de: B sagt "Ez amûran difroşim" und präzisiert "gîtar û tembûrê difroşim" — Ich verkaufe Gitarren und Tembure.

explanation.en: B says "Na, ez najenim" — No, I don't play. Even though B sells temburs, B does not play them.
explanation.de: B sagt "Na, ez najenim" — Nein, ich spiele nicht. Obwohl B Tembure verkauft, spielt B sie nicht.

instruction.en: Complete: Ez ji muzîka kurdî hez ___.
instruction.de: Vervollständige: Ez ji muzîka kurdî hez ___.

explanation.en: "hez kirin" = to like. For "ez" (I): hez dikim. The phrase uses "ji" before the thing you like: Ez ji ... hez dikim.
explanation.de: "hez kirin" = mögen. Für "ez" (ich): hez dikim. Die Wendung verwendet "ji" vor dem, was man mag: Ez ji ... hez dikim.

explanation.en: jenîn (to play music) → for "tu": dijenî. Tu tembûrê dijenî? = Do you play the tembur?
explanation.de: jenîn (Musik spielen) → für "tu": dijenî. Tu tembûrê dijenî? = Spielst du die Tembur?

instruction.en: Match the verb to what it means in this dialogue
instruction.de: Ordne das Verb seiner Bedeutung in diesem Dialog zu
